title: ASEAN reaffirms unity and defence cooperation amid regional tensions
description: At a recent defence ministers’ meeting, delegates explored areas of cooperation, including cyber defence, artificial intelligence and disaster response.
content:

title: Over One Lakh Tech Employees Laid Off Across 218 Firms In 2025 As AI-driven Restructuring Reshapes Global Workforce
description: From Silicon Valley to Bengaluru, major technology firms are cutting staff and restructuring operations as they pivot towards artificial intelligence, automation, and profitability after years of rapid expansion during the pandemic.
content:
New Delhi: More than one lakh employees have lost their jobs across 218 tech companies so far in 2025, marking one of the largest waves of layoffs in recent years.

title: Trump says China, others can't have Nvidia top AI chips
description: Artificial intelligence giant Nvidia's most advanced chips will be reserved for US companies and kept out of China and other countries, US President Donald Trump said.
content:
